TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCell/DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 将 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

span.span: Provides information about a to accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体包括内置的辅助功能支持，使你的应用程序能够使用具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications. 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕弱视和审阅者实用程序、语音输入实用程序、屏幕键盘、备用输入设备和键盘增强实用程序。Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 类继承自 类，以便向具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序提供有关 的信息。The class inherits from the class to provide information about a to accessibility client applications. 每个表示 的可视部分的类（如 、、 和 ）还包含从 继承以提供有关包含类的信息并代表可访问性执行操作的类客户端应用程序。Each class that represents a visual part of the - such as , , and - also contains a class that inherits from to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications. 在某些情况下，你将需要向具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序提供附加信息（例如 控件的名称或说明）。There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the control, to accessibility client applications. 提供此附加信息的方法有两种。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供现有控件的有限辅助功能信息，请设置控件的 和 属性值，这些值将报告给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. > [!NOTE] > 只应在极少数情况下更改 和 属性值，例如，如果您将 显示为列表。You should change the and property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a look like a list. 有时，你可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或不同的辅助功能操作，才能包含在你的自定义 或 中。Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom or . 若要自定义可访问性，可以编写自己的类，该类派生自 或 类，并重写 方法。To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the or classes and override the method. 例如，如果您要编写一个自定义行标题单元格来实现独特的自定义操作（例如单元中的特殊命中测试），则应创建一个继承自 类的类并重写 方法。For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the class and override the method. 使用 值来定义数据表层次结构，从而公开其数据结构。The exposes its data structure by using values to define the data table hierarchy. 有关向 Microsoft Active Accessibility 公开数据表的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 "通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility 公开数据表 https://msdn.microsoft.com/library"。For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与 关联的默认操作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与此 关联的单元格是 ，则此方法不执行任何操作。If the cell associated with this is a , this method does nothing. 否则，此方法将选择单元格，使其成为当前单元格，并执行以下操作之一：Otherwise, this method selects the cell, makes it the current cell, and takes one of the following actions: - 如果该单元格的 属性值为 `true`，则此方法返回。If the cell's property value is `true`, this method returns. - 如果该单元格的 属性值为 `null`，表示该单元不能承载编辑控件，则此方法返回。If the cell's property value is `null`, meaning the cell cannot host an editing control, this method returns. - 如果该单元格当前正在进入或离开编辑模式（例如，如果在 或 事件处理程序中调用此方法），则此方法返回。If the cell is currently entering or leaving edit mode (for example, if this method is called in a or event handler), this method returns. - 如果该单元格当前处于编辑模式，则此方法提交并结束编辑。If the cell is currently in edit mode, this method commits and ends the edit. - 如果该单元格未处于编辑模式，并且 属性设置为 ，则此方法返回。If the cell is not in edit mode and the property is set to , this method returns. - 如果未执行上述操作，则此方法会导致单元格进入编辑模式。If none of the preceding actions is taken, this method causes the cell to enter edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个字符串，其中包含所属单元格的类型名称后跟括号中其基类型的名称，例如 "`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` （`DataGridViewCell`）"。This property returns a string that includes the owning cell's type name followed by the name of its base type in parentheses, such as "`DataGridViewTextBoxCell` (`DataGridViewCell`)".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了哪些 拥有为每个参数值 方法返回的 。The following table describes which owns the that is returned by the method for each parameter value. |参数值Parameter value|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||当前单元格右侧的 。The to the right of the current cell. 如果当前单元格在最右侧的列中， 将返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the right-most column.| ||当前单元格左侧的 。The to the left of the current cell. 如果当前单元格位于最左侧列中， 为行标题返回一个辅助性对象。 returns an accessible object for the row header if the current cell is in the left-most column.| ||具有下一个较高索引的 。The that has the next higher index. 如果当前单元格位于第一列中， 返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first column.| ||具有下一个较低索引的 。The that has the next lower index. 如果当前单元格位于最后一列，则 返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last column.| ||同一列中的 以及当前单元格的上一行。The in the same column and one row above the current cell. 如果当前单元格在第一行中， 将返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the first row.| ||同一列中的 ，当前单元格下有一行。The in the same column and one row below the current cell. 如果当前单元格位于最后一行中， 返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the current cell is in the last row.| |所有其他 值All other values|`null`。`null`.|

summary.span: 修改选择内容或移动辅助性对象的键盘焦点。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了 方法针对每个 `flags` 值执行的操作。The following table describes the action performed by the method for each `flags` value. |参数值Parameter value|操作Action| |---------------------|------------| || 获取焦点。The takes focus.| ||拥有此 的 取得焦点。The that owns this takes focus.| || 将添加到 属性中。The is added to the property.| ||将从 属性中删除 。The is removed from the property.| |所有其他 值All other values|不执行任何操作。No action is taken.|

summary.span: 获取 的状态。

span.span: Gets the state of the .
A bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值始终包括 和 值。The return value always includes the and values. 如果选择了关联的单元格，它还包括 值; 如果单元格具有键盘焦点，则为 值; 如果当前未显示该单元格，则为 值。It also includes the value if the associated cell is selected, the value if the cell has keyboard focus, and the value if the cell is not currently displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示所属单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Gets or sets a string representing the formatted value of the owning cell.

value.span: 单元格值的 表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the cell value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个字符串，该字符串表示单元 属性的值。The property contains a string that represents the value of the cell property. 如果 `null`，则 包含字符串 "（null）"。If is `null`, contains the string "(null)". 如果所属单元格为标题单元格、为只读或不属于行，则设置此属性不起作用。Setting this property has no effect if the owning cell is a header cell, is read-only, or does not belong to a row. 否则，设置此属性：Otherwise, setting this property: - 结束当前正在进行的任何编辑并提交值。Ends any edit currently in progress and commits the value. - 使用单元 和 方法将指定的值转换为单元 属性所指示的类型。Uses the cell and methods to convert the specified value to the type indicated by the cell property. - 将单元格值设置为转换后的值。Sets the cell value to the converted value.
